Summary: Production server down in APAC region
Description: Users across Asia unable to access ERP portal due to server downtime.

Summary: Email delivery delayed for several employees
Description: Email queue backlog causing delay in mail delivery by 2 hours.

Summary: Password reset request for single user
Description: Employee forgot password and is unable to access HRMS.

Summary: Security breach detected on finance database
Description: Suspicious login attempts detected from external IP.
Alignment of charts is off on the analytics dashboard in Chrome.

Summary: Database latency in order management system
Description: Query response time exceeding 5 seconds during peak hours.

Summary: VPN connection issue for remote employees
Description: Several employees unable to connect to corporate VPN during working hours.
Quarterly export report failing with timeout error.
